review: I don't know how I lived without this!  The Fire TV Stick is wonderful!  I love to listen to music on my tv and dance around the living room.  It even puts the lyrics up on the screen, so you can sing along!  It's great to have all my shows on my tv, without having to hook up the laptop to stream.  Best Amazon invention!

review: I love it, nice way to be able to watch my streaming shows on the bigger screen. Interface is easy. Can take with me to friends for viewing parties. Would eventually love something that doesn't also need to plug in (the outlets behind the TV are overflowing at this point), but that doesn't affect the user experience. Remote works well.
